opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Adams.

casebody.head_matter:
Potochnik v. Pittsburgh Railways Co., Appellant.
Argued October 8, 1954.
Before Stern, C. J., Stearne, Jones, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.

Donald M. Bane, with him James A. G-elts, Leo Daniels and Prichard, Lawler & Gelts, for appellant.
